about_the_game:
"Baker Street Breakouts" is an exciting new game that puts players in the shoes of the world's greatest detective. It combines the thrill of an escape room with the storytelling of an adventure. Players must use their superior deduction skills and the ability to combine items to solve riddles and overcome obstacles. Fans of the original Sherlock Holmes stories will appreciate the many quotes and references to the classic tales, as well as the game's many pop-cultural references.





Sherlock is bored. None of the recent cases have been interesting enough to catch his attention. Until one day, when Sherlock receives a message from Moriarty that changes everything. What at first appears to be a classical "damsel in distress" situation, turns into a confrontation with his inner demons. Forced to play Moriarty's insidious game, Sherlock deduces his way through an old film studio to finaly face his arch nemesis.
The game is based on the classic Sherlock Holmes stories, and features many references to the original stories as well as other popular works. This engaging and immersive storyline will keep players hooked from start to finish.







One of the things that sets "Baker Street Breakouts" apart is its focus on puzzles and deduction. Instead of combat or grinding, the game challenges players to use their superior deduction skills and the ability to combine items in order to solve riddles and progress through the game. This makes for a unique and engaging gameplay experience that is sure to keep players on the edge of their seats.
The game features 2 playable characters, 18 NPC characters, and 10 rooms with approximately 1 hour of playtime each. Players will have to find, examine, and combine over 100 items as they make their way through the game. The game also features 18 music tracks and 40 puzzles to solve.

name: Baker Street Breakouts: A Sherlockian Escape Adventure

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: Baker Street Breakouts: A Sherlockian Escape Adventure - $9.99 USD

package_groups.title: Buy Baker Street Breakouts: A Sherlockian Escape Adventure

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Athlon II X3 455 Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6800 Series
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

reviews:
“Baker Street Breakouts does what it advertises: It gives a Sherlock Holmes experience emphasizing 'puzzles and deduction'. Given how enthralling the challenges are, HiSv has executed this exceptionally well.”
4.5/5 – Adventure Gamers

“Baker Street Breakouts stands out in the gaming landscape with its unique visual presentation, engaging puzzles, and a race against time that keeps players on the edge of their seats. Signed by HiSv Studio, this title provides an experience that is definitely worth exploring for escape room enthusiasts and fans of immersive adventures.”
6/10 – Indie Games Devel
short_description: "Baker Street Breakouts" combines the thrill of an Escape Room with the storytelling of an Adventure. Use your superior deduction skills in this story-driven mystery to help Sherlock deducing his way through an old film studio to finally face his arch nemesis Moriarty. Become a Master of Deduction!
